txt_en: Have a childlike innocence in life, and your days will always be accompanied by happiness.
txt_cn: 生活中拥有童心，你的日子将时时与快乐相伴。

txt_en: The fact that you are beaten by darkness proves that you are light itself.
txt_cn: 你被黑暗敲打，恰恰证明你是光明本身。

txt_en: The darker the sky, the brighter the stars.
Whatever happens tomorrow, we have had today.
txt_cn: 不管明天会发生什么，至少我们拥有今天。

txt_en: The road is tortuous, but the future is bright.
txt_cn: 前路虽有崎岖坎坷，未来却会光明万丈。

txt_en: All your efforts will pay off one day.
txt_cn: 你所有的努力终会有所回报。

txt_en: Turn sweat into pearls and dreams into reality.
txt_cn: 把汗水变成珍珠，把梦想变成现实。

txt_en: At that time, youth was blooming, with the sun blazing and wind kissing the treetop.
txt_cn: 人间骄阳正好，风过树梢，彼时他们正当年少。

txt_en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
Youth is not afraid of the long years, there is still glory in the other side.
txt_cn: 少年不惧岁月长，彼方尚有荣光在。

txt_en: Out of sight, out of mind.
Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.
txt_cn: 奇迹有时候是会发生的,但是你得为之拼命地努力。
